description.en:
The learning process addresses the impact of diversity and cultural difference on creative team performance and analyzes how different management strategies can affect team dynamics and productivity. During the course, many practical exercises are carried out in multicultural teams, which allows student to apply what they have learned immediately.
Key topics include:
	*	Cultivating Adaptive Leadership: Learn how to develop mindsets, culture, and people-centric strategies to navigate change and foster resilience within your team.
	*	Mastering Team Dynamics: Understand the roles, skills, and collaborative techniques that drive team success.
	*	Optimizing Performance in Lean Creative Teams: Discover strategies for achieving agility and excellence in fast-paced, creative environments.
	*	Innovation in Creative Teams (Design Thinking): Explore how to apply design thinking principles to drive innovation and solve complex challenges collaboratively.
	*	Building Bridges: Effective Communication and Conflict Resolution: Enhance your ability to communicate clearly and resolve conflicts constructively within your team.
	*	Building and Scaling Teams: Gain insights into recruiting, nurturing, and scaling teams for sustainable growth.
	*	Leading Through Uncertainty: Develop strategies to inspire and guide your team through ambiguous and challenging situations.
description.et: Õppeprotsessis käsitletakse mitmekesisuse ja kultuurilise erinevuse mõju loovmeeskonna tulemustele ning analüüsitakse, kuidas erinevad juhtimisstrateegiad võivad mõjutada meeskonna dünaamikat ja produktiivsust. Aine käigus tehakse palju praktilisi harjutusi multikultuursetes tiimides, mis võimaldab õpitut koheselt rakendada.

objectives.en: This course equips participants with the knowledge and tools to lead high-performing creative teams in dynamic and uncertain environments (start-ups). Through an engaging mix of lectures, seminars, and hands-on activities, you will explore cutting-edge strategies for fostering adaptive leadership, enhancing team dynamics, and driving innovation.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on anda üliõpilastele teoreetiline teadmine multikultuursete meeskondade juhtimisest ning selle eripäradest. Praktiliselt rakendatakse omandatud teadmisi grupitöödes. Üliõpilased analüüsivad mitmekesisuse ja multikultuursuse mõjusid meeskonnatööle ning testivad erinevaid juhtimisstrateegiaid, mis sobivad nende meeskonnale.

learning_outcomes.en: The student: *knows different approaches to managing multicultural creative teams and can apply them in practical work; *analyzes the impact of diversity and cultural difference on the performance of the creative team; *uses management strategies that promote teamwork and productivity; *understands and manages conflicts in multicultural teams and can apply mediation and reconciliation skills; *can implement effective communication in multicultural teams
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane: *teab erinevaid lähenemisviise multikultuursete loovmeeskondade juhtimisele ning oskab neid rakendada praktilises töös; *analüüsib mitmekesisuse ja kultuurilise erinevuse mõju loovmeeskonna tulemustele; *kasutab juhtimisstrateegiaid, mis soodustavad meeskonnatööd ja produktiivsust; *mõistab ja haldab konflikte multikultuursetes meeskondades ning oskab rakendada vahendus- ja lepitusoskusi; *oskab rakendada efektiivset suhtlemist multikultuursetes meeskondades

grade_preconditions.et: The course culminates in a practical project: designing a comprehensive team strategy. This assignment integrates concepts learned throughout the course, providing actionable insights to implement in real-world scenarios.

grade_evaluation.et:
Grading:
	1.	Multiple-choice test - 20%
	2.	Active participation in seminars - 20%
	3.	Homework (team strategy) - 60%
